Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway/Nagaritha Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Nagaritha Drive and Lankshire Parkway.
Room.LongDescription: The intersection of Nagaritha and Lankshire is just north of the Klondike Wheat Fields and the DeNail Corn Fields, both of which may be entered off of Lankshire Parkway to the south. Nagaritha Drive runs east and west through most of the southern part of town. Lankshire runs north and south, eventually passing the Necropolis towards the center of town.
